name: VTOL: Vertical Take-Off and Landing
description:
VTOL:

Experimental VTOL aircraft capable of vertical take-off and landing are revolutionizing warfare for military forces world-wide. As the test-pilot for the LB-GDX personnel and munitions transport, will you be able to save the world from Nuclear Armageddon?

Made for the libGDX Jam of March 2020. Download the Desktop version (JAVA) for better performance.

Default Controls:

Rotate Left: LEFT

Rotate Right: RIGHT

Thrust: UP

Retractable Claw: Z
